title: [Vornavis, Outlands Road]
description: Reaching southward from a line of mountains just visible on the northern horizon, foothills rise up from the shallow slopes covered by the steppe grasses.  Here and there, the paler greys of exposed rock faces can be seen beneath the moonlight.

Reaching southward from a line of grey mountains just visible on the northern horizon, foothills rise up from the brighter green of the steppe grasses.  Here and there, the lighter earth tones of exposed rock faces show through the vegetation on the steeper slopes.
